feed.title: Visualization Portfolio - STAT 479 Spring 2022
feed.subtitle: Student visualizations from the Spring 2022 edition of Statistical Data Visualization at UW Madison.

entry.title: Student Test Scores
entry.content: Societal factors impact us all more than we think. Societal factors can heavily influence someone’s educational success and success in life. This fictional data set from Kaggle allowed. Click here to visit the interactive app.
entry.summary: Societal factors impact us all more than we think. Societal factors can heavily influence someone’s educational success and success in life. This fictional data set from Kaggle allowed. Click here to visit the interactive app.

entry.title: Formula 1 Racing
entry.content: An interactive graph for analyzing the best drivers of formula 1 since 1950-2020 based on race wins and the teams dominating the constructor’s championship based on the points.
entry.summary: An interactive graph for analyzing the best drivers of formula 1 since 1950-2020 based on race wins and the teams dominating the constructor’s championship based on the points.
